nodes.documentation:
@title First version of 'course' smart contract.
describing a demo of upgradable smartcontract.
course is smartcontract of an academeic subject where teacher enrolling students
and as per student's evaluation increase/decrease marks.
nodes.name: CourseV1

nodes.documentation: @dev sets teacher
@dev Modifier ensuring only caller is teacher account.
nodes.name: onlyTeacher
enroll
increaseMarks
decreaseMarks

nodes.documentation:
@dev return student's marks.
@param _student - student whose marks to be returned
nodes.name: getMarks

nodes.documentation: Event {StudentEnrolled} - when new student enrolled
nodes.name: StudentEnrolled

nodes.documentation: Event {MarksIncreased} - when student's marks increased
nodes.name: MarksIncreased

nodes.documentation: Event {MarksDecreased} - when student's marks decreased
nodes.name: MarksDecreased

nodes.documentation:
@title First version of 'course' smart contract.
describing a demo of upgradable smartcontract.
course is smartcontract of an academeic subject where teacher enrolling students
and as per student's evaluation increase/decrease marks.
nodes.name: CourseV1

nodes.documentation: @dev sets teacher
@dev Modifier ensuring only caller is teacher account.
nodes.name: onlyTeacher
enroll
increaseMarks
decreaseMarks

nodes.documentation:
@dev return student's marks.
@param _student - student whose marks to be returned
nodes.name: getMarks

nodes.documentation: Event {StudentEnrolled} - when new student enrolled
nodes.name: StudentEnrolled

nodes.documentation: Event {MarksIncreased} - when student's marks increased
nodes.name: MarksIncreased

nodes.documentation: Event {MarksDecreased} - when student's marks decreased
nodes.name: MarksDecreased

decreaseMarks(address,uint256).details: student's marks decreased by teacher. Modifier - ensuring only teacher can decrease marks

params._student: - student whose marks to be decreased

enroll(address,uint256).details: students can be enrolled by teacher in his course. Modifier - ensuring only teacher can enroll students

params._marks: - initial marks (if any) or set default zero.

params._student: - student whose marks to be returned

increaseMarks(address,uint256).details: student's marks increase by teacher. Modifier - ensuring only teacher can increase marks

params._student: - student whose marks to be increased

devdoc.title: First version of 'course' smart contract. describing a demo of upgradable smartcontract. course is smartcontract of an academeic subject where teacher enrolling students and as per student's evaluation increase/decrease marks.
